scripts.dev:all: PROJECT_ROOT="$PWD" osascript -e 'set projectRoot to system attribute "PROJECT_ROOT"' -e 'set frontendPath to projectRoot & "/frontend"' -e 'set backendPath to projectRoot & "/backend"' -e 'tell application "Terminal"' -e 'activate' -e 'tell application "System Events" to keystroke "t" using command down' -e 'delay 0.2' -e 'do script "cd " & quoted form of frontendPath & " && npm run dev" in selected tab of front window' -e 'tell application "System Events" to keystroke "t" using command down' -e 'delay 0.2' -e 'do script "cd " & quoted form of backendPath & " && npm run dev" in selected tab of front window' -e 'end tell'
